titles.title: To eliminate the waitout period for Hispanic-serving institutions under section 504 of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/12/2002--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit a Hispanic-serving institution to secure a subsequent five-year grant award immediately after the expiration of its most recent five-year award (eliminating the two-year waitout period between grants).
